resources.string: Mia
Excuse me, Master.
There is new event, please don\'t forget that.
|Title：%s\n |Description：%s\n
Master, you have new a date?
Please fill in the title and setup the time.
Then Mia will remind you later.
What? The date has changed?
I will correct it immediately.
|お帰りなさいませ、御主人様。\n |You may click the message to continue.
Master could press MENU key and add something that need Mia remind you.
By the way, if Master long click on the item, you could edit or delete it.
Here is activity of this month.
Master, please take care your self, don\'t be to so hard.
Master want to see all activity? Please wait a moment.
Here is it. Does Mia forget something?
Here is all the event that Mia has reminded Master....
They are memories between us, aren\'t they?
|What? About Mia?\n |I am Mia the maid. Master could tell me what event you need Mia to remind you.
|Master may take a look at Maidroid, it\'s where Mia come from.
And Mia is created by whatzz and brianhsu.
If Master use Google Calendar service, Mia could remind you the event on the Calendar.
Just provide the username and password, Mia would handle everything!
This event? Let me see....
I remember Mia should remind Master at %s，is that correct?
|Mia should remind Master the following event at %s :\n |%s
Is that correct?
Do you really want to delete it, Master?
Delete "%s"
OK, Mia got it.
See you laster, my Master.
Master, it seems you forgot to fill in the title.
Master, it looks like the date and time is wrong.
Excuse me, Master.
Master, you forget tell Mia your google account!
Wha.... Master do not give me the password, what shoul Mia do?
